item.title: He’s just Ken: LeBron James becomes first pro male athlete Barbie doll as Mattel bets on adult customers
item.description: Mattel’s release of a LeBron James Ken doll solidifies its stance in growing its adult consumer base.

item.title: Third IRS head since Trump’s inauguration resigns because she reportedly wasn’t told about an agreement forcing the agency to give taxpayer data to immigration officials
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem signed the agreement on Monday, April 7.

item.title: Apple’s Steve Jobs dealt with the 2008 financial crisis not by layoffs or slimming spending but by investing his way through the downturn—and it paid off
item.description: Just two years after the 2008 financial crisis, Apple released the iPad.
